Name: Flow Failure
Description: A flow that will be executed when a Flow fails unexpectedly.
Author: FileFlows

Name: File
Description: A blank file template with a single "Input File" input node.
Author: FileFlows

Name: Folder
Description:
A blank folder template with a single "Input Folder" input node.
NOTE: This template should only be used to process a Folder instead of Files.  Processing a Folder has processing limitations as the Folder is being processed and not files contained in that folder.
For example you cannot convert a Folder to a MP3 or to a different Video format.  You can however zip a folder.
Author: FileFlows

Name: Audio File
Description: A blank Audio template with a single "Audio File" input node.
Author: FileFlows

Name: Convert Audio
Description: Will convert audio files to the specified format and replace the original file.
Author: FileFlows

Name: Convert Audio to Video
Description:
Convert an audio file into a video file generated a visualization of the audio.
See the [Audio To Video](https://docs.fileflows.com/plugins/video-nodes/audio-to-video) node for more information
Author: FileFlows

Name: Video File
Description: A blank Video template with a single "Video File" input node.
Author: FileFlows

Name: Convert Video
Description: A flow that will convert a video file
Author: FileFlows

Name: Convert Video to Audio
Description: A flow that will convert audio from a video file into a audio file
Author: FileFlows

Name: Convert Video: VP9
Description: Convert to VP9/webm/1080p with options to normalize the audio
Author: reven

Name: Convert Comic
Description: A flow that will convert a comic books from CBR, CBZ, CB7, PDF, GZ, BZ2 to either CBZ or PDF
Author: FileFlows

Name: Resize Image
Description: A flow to resize image files
Author: FileFlows

Name: Image File
Description: A blank Image template with a single "Image File" input node.
Author: FileFlows

Name: Convert Movies/TV to AV1/webm
Description: Converts movies and TV Shows for AV1/webm and moves the file.   Will crop black bars, and remove unwanted audio and subtitles.
Author: Grimo

Name: Convert Video to VP9/WebM/Opus/1080P
Description: Convert video to VP9/WebM/Opus/1080P and move to destination
Author: reven

Name: Convert Movies and Move
Description:
A video conversion flow that will convert videos to HEVC with AC3 audio.  It will then move these to the Output folder and deletes the source folder, if there are no more video files found in it.

This will always move the input file to the output file, even if no processing is required.
Author: reven

Name: Convert TV Shows and Move
Description:
A TV  conversion flow that will convert videos to HEVC with AC3 audio.  It will then move these to the Output folder and deletes the source folder, if there are no more video files found in it

Aimed at TV shows and uses a lower quality the similar Convert Movies and Move flow.

This will always move the input file to the output file, even if no processing is required.
Author: reven
